name: FM7 Resort Hotel Jakarta

reviews.text: You’ve got to love a hotel that has a sign that says “please complain” in the room. But there is very little to complain about this little gem. We had to stay overnight in Jakarta on our way to Palangkaraya and thanks to other reviewers I chose this hotel. Booked a room via fax and received return fax confirmation within the hour. Our flight from Bali was two hours delayed but hotel staff was waiting for us upon arrival to take us to the hotel. Had problems hooking up to the internet, but technical support was at the door within minutes of the phone call, not once but twice! I’ve been away for work for a week, and it was fantastic to relax using their well equipped gym, pool, huge sauna & steamroom, 25 feet hot tub, cold plunge pool! Lockers provided with amenities such as shorts, towels, slippers, robe. Not sure about ladies lockers. There is a karaoke lounge and a bar as well.
reviews.title: What's there to complain?

likes.liked: — Fantastic as a transit hotel in Jakarta

reviews.text: My experience mirrors all the previous posters, and I based my decision to stay here on those reviews. I booked a room for $49 a night and accepted the offer for the free shuttle. When I arrived, I didn't expect to have a hotel rep holding a sign with my name on it. That's usually for paid limo services.
reviews.title: Same as all the previous reviews: Excellent!

likes.disliked: — Remote location, but that is expected at an airport hotel

reviews.text: Anyways, I get my luggage and take the 5 minute ride to the hotel. I arrive at the front desk and the clerk already knew who I was and processed my check-in efficiently. She also changed my US dollars into Rupiahs, although the rate was 250R less than the airport changers.
reviews.title: Perfect transit hotel for Jakarta

likes.disliked: — the lack of sense at times, like with the karaoke being right on the business floor

reviews.title: Surprisingly Airport Hotel in Jakarta
reviews.text: I had the evening to kill and since there is nothing really around the hotel to visit at night, I went for a massage at the hotel spa which was 170,000 R. Got a good night's sleep in the large room and enjoyed the breakfast buffet which is included in the room rate.

Note that the shuttle to the airport appears to run hourly on a reserved basis so make sure you get your name on the list and early enough to get to the airport on time. I took the 9am shuttle for a 10:45am flight and made it OK.
reviews.title: Great hotel and service

reviews.text: I made my booking via email and although they were quick to reply they didn't always answer what I was actually asking for. After a couple of more replies it was sorted though.
reviews.title: Excellent service at good value

reviews.text: Upon arrival at the airport in Jakarta we were met just beyond immigration (before customs!) by an employee with my nametag. Although we had a reservation for 6 people (3 double rooms) the employee was surprised that there were 6 of us. This was quickly sorted by a phone call though and any tips were refused.
reviews.title: Great Value Transit Hotel Close to Airport

reviews.text: We had reserved club rooms at the hotel. These rooms feature a separate check-in desk that for some reason looks much less fancy than the main reception desk, furthermore it is located next to the karaoke rooms so it was very loud. These are only minor things though and the service we got was good.
reviews.title: Excellent and worth the money..

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room looked pretty boring but it was nice with the stone floor. The room was very quiet. We got some complimentary fruit in the evening and in the early morning we had breakfast delivered to our room at no extra charge.
reviews.title: Good value transit hotel but with quirks

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The restaurant was good enough with decent prices.
reviews.title: Quirky hotel. I loved it.
Spectacular and realxing Swimming pool + Saunaaa
reviews.text: After deciding to have a holiday trip to Bali, I and my partners decided to look around travel agent to book the ticket and accomodation. The ticket was pretty easy, but I had to stopover Jakarta as my flight need to transit for 1 night. Therefore I need an accomodation at Jakarta which is relatively near the airport as my flight will arrived on the evening and flying on next early morning.

likes.liked: — Facilies, Free Shuttle Bus, Economic price
likes.disliked: — Not enought time to go over all they offer

description: A new 4 stars Hotel with customer satisfaction oriented emerging as the ultimate redefinition of Airport Hotel in Jakarta. Combined with appealing room rate and compiled in one stop accommodation concept which offer simplicity & comfort just 2 KM away from Jakarta Airport. Completed with all you could ask business equipment and broadband internet will keep you comfort and at ease all the time. There are so many great ways to enjoy your valuable free time while staying at FM7 Resort Hotel. All these first class facilities just next to your room door.
